intro:
I'm an experience-focused developer who works closely with companies and individuals to build strategies and impactful digital products for their brands.

Full time, I lead technology at [Upstatement](https://upstatement.com), a digital product studio, with a focus on managing long-term partnerships and building stuff with a strong editorial focus.

I've made beer that has been called "pretty average", and I have a tendency to yell at Boston sports teams. Mostly, I just like to make stuff.
